DOC.brief_summary: This trial is a randomized, multi-center, non-inferiority study comparing observation versus immediate surgery for low grade, noninvasive bladder cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Observation Versus Immediate Surgery of Low Risk Bladder Cancer
